long: Meaning: properly, "deputyship", i.e. "ministry"; generally, "employment" (never servile) or "work" (abstractly or concretely); also "property" (as the result of labor).  Usage: business,   cattle,   industrious, occupation, (  -pied),   officer, thing (made), use, (manner of) work((-man), -manship).  Source: from the same as "H4397";
